entry.title: Candid, episode #56: Bitten in Inconvenient Places
entry.content: I recount my Argentinian adventures, Marius writes about iPad photography workflows, and we offer some thoughts and resolutions for the new year.

entry.title: Candid, episode #55: What's With You and Eating Mosquitos?
entry.content: Josh welcomes a new family member and I prepare for my upcoming trip to Argentina. We talk iPhone photography and travel preparation, including dealing with mosquitos, moisture, filters, and backing up your shots on the road.

entry.title: Candid, episode #54: Mint in Box
entry.content: In this episode, we address some listener feedback before talking about our experiences and recommendations for dealing with eBay and other used markets for buying and selling.

entry.title: Candid, Episode #53: He´s got dust in his Lightroom
entry.content: There’s a new Lightroom in town! Well… two new Lightrooms. It’s all a bit confusing, but we’re here to help untangle it.

entry.title: Candid, Episode #52: Behind the Shot
entry.content: In an experimental new segment, we choose an image from each others’ recent work and try to dissect the story and technique that went into realizing it. It was fun.
